1.title: Homicidal Secrets
1.plot: Happy newlywed Sherri Rasmussen answers the door after her husband leaves for work and ends up in a fight for her life.

2.title: Teenage Rage
2.plot: Dinah Peterson sneaks out to see her boyfriend on Valentines Day, but he says she never shows up, and she never makes it home again.

3.title: A Friend to Die For
3.plot: Art student Shelley Nance is found dead in her bed with multiple stab wounds and it looks like her ninja boyfriend is the killer. But it turns out more than one person might want this young co-ed dead.

4.title: Killer Hookup
4.plot: After a night of partying, law student Jesse Valencia is found with his throat slashed. He is a free spirit in the college gay party circuit, so there is no shortage of suspects: it appears one of his lovers had a secret to keep.

5.title: Blood in Biloxi
5.plot: When Vince and Margaret Sherry get shot in their home, it looks like a professional hit. So who would want to kill this respected judge and his politically connected wife? Turns out there are a lot of reasons the underbelly of Biloxi wants them dead.

6.title: Killer Payback
6.plot: Gary Triano has lost a fortune through bad investments, and somebody wants to get their money back. But who wants it bad enough to blow him up?

7.title: Sleeping with the Devil
7.plot: When David Harmon is bludgeoned to death in his bed, his traumatized wife tells a lurid story of masked burglars, but police start to suspect there is something evil afoot in this conservative religious town.

8.title: Moving Day Murder
8.plot: Melissa Mooney was thrilled to move into her new house, but when her FBI co-workers find her strangled in her bed on moving day, they launch a personal manhunt to catch her killer.

9.title: Nightmare on Campus
9.plot: When 17 year old Taylor Behl started college, she was confident she was ready for life on her own. But after she vanishes, it soon becomes apparent to police that she had fallen into a very dark world that would only end up in her murder.

10.title: Circle of Distrust
10.plot: When seventeen-year-old Missy Avila is found drowned in a woodland stream, police discover she has been badly beaten and her long hair cut off. The investigation slowly unravels a passionate story of rage, jealousy, and betrayal.

11.title: Deck the Halls with Murder
11.plot: Hard working celebrity small businesswoman Mary Ann Clibbery is found bludgeoned inside her own remodeling business just before Christmas, and police are completely stymied as to who would want this well liked entrepreneur dead.

12.title: Death in Marriage
12.plot: Carolyn Stahl is expecting a surprise for her birthday, but instead ends up being gunned down alongside her husband in their car. It looks like a professional hit, but what police can't tell is who is the intended target?

13.title: Star-Crossed Killer
13.plot: After mother-to-be Rhoni Reuter is shot to death in her Chicago condo, at first all attention is directed at the baby's father, former NFL football player Shaun Gayle. However, it is soon discovered that Shaun has many more girlfriends than just Rhoni, and more than one of them has an issue with that.

14.title: Horror in Hollywood
14.plot: When Hollywood cameraman Robert Samuels is brutally gunned down in his own home, somebody wants to make it look like a burglary. But police slowly uncover a dark conspiracy based in greed and betrayal - a story right out of the movies.

15.title: The Phantom Suspect
15.plot: With multiple gunshot wounds husband barely survives, to tell his incredible eye-witness account of how his wife was murdered. Police know how it happened, but the mystery will lie in why she was killed.

16.title: Murder on the Dance Floor
16.plot: In the 1970's, twenty-three year-old Janet Walsh is tied-up and strangled on her bed after a night of disco dancing. With her nightclub lifestyle, police have an eye to several lovers as suspects, but the days of disco will long be over by the time her killer is finally brought to justice.

17.title: The Cheating Killer
17.plot: Police are puzzled when they find the body of divorced mother Kathleen Lipscomb curled up by the side of a road. Unravelling the mystery of how she got there will take them into a dark world of corruption, bribes, and deadly ambition.

18.title: Kill Pill
18.plot: When Sue Snow takes some pills in the morning and suddenly dies from cyanide poisoning, police think they may have another random pill poisoning on their hands. But when a second victim appears, it starts to look like someone has a very personal motive.

19.title: Killer Affair
19.plot: When Rozanne Gailiunas opens her door for a floral delivery and ends up shot in the head, police are focus on her estranged husband and secret lover. But all trails go cold until someone walks into the police station with a bizarre claim that they married the hit-man who was hired to kill Rozanne.

20.title: Red Hot Murder
20.plot: Lanell Barsock's best friend finds her fatally shot in her own house and tells police she saw Lanell's boyfriend at the crime scene. This open-and-shut case is complicated by the fact the victim has more than one jealous boyfriend, and a few jealous girlfriends as well.

21.title: It Was All a Lie
21.plot: A wounded and bleeding Charles Stuart phones 911 with a terrified tale of carjacking, that results in the death of his pregnant wife. As police mount a manhunt for the described killers, something just doesn't add up. It's not until the discovery of a missing wedding ring that the real killer emerges.

22.title: Murder in Greenwich
22.plot: After defrauding his clients of more than 40 million dollars, it is no surprise to police when Andrew Kissel is found tied up and stabbed in the basement of his rented mansion. With so many people wanting him punished, who was angry enough to make it a personal vendetta?

23.title: Satanic Homicide
23.plot: Satan worship may have come to the peaceful town of Idaho Falls when two friends are shot to death in their beds, with the words "Satan loves you" left as a message in the kitchen. As the case widens, it becomes clear that there are several people who may have wanted these women dead, and Satan isn't one of them.

24.title: Murder for a Price
24.plot: When the comfortably wealthy couple Dennis and Merna Koula are violently gunned down in their suburban home, police suspect a home invasion. But when the investigation reveals no signs of a burglary to go with the execution style killing, police start to look for someone who thinks they would be more profitable dead than alive.

25.title: Silent Nightmare
25.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

26.title: Staged to Kill
26.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

27.title: Blinded by Blonde
27.plot: Brian Barrett was shot to death in his car just before he was supposed to meet his on-line dream girl for the first time. In order to catch the killer, police must venture into the murky world of on-line chat rooms, where no one is necessarily who they say they are. But how to you catch a killer who is a virtual shadow?

28.title: Voice from the Grave
28.plot: During an argument, dancer Stephanie Bruner walks out on her husband during a Colorado blizzard and is never seen alive again. When search parties find her body in a river, the manhunt changes to a murder investigation.

29.title: Friends with Killer Benefits
29.plot: When Derrick Dorsey finds his wife Kim dead beside their bed, and he tells 9-1-1 that he thinks it's a suicide. Police find it's a strange conclusion, considering there are bullet holes in the wall and zip ties around Kim's wrists.

30.title: Luxury, Jealousy and Murder
30.plot: Wealthy and successful businessman Ben Novack Jr. is found bludgeoned to death, midway through a large New York convention. Was it his reckless playboy lifestyle that caught up with him, or did a killer just have an eye on the money?

31.title: Secrets Can Kill
31.plot: When police informant Susan Smith disappears without a trace, police just assume she has just taken off again. But her sister Shelby keeps insisting that Susan's mystery boyfriend was up to no good, and as the months go by, it starts to look like she's right.

32.title: Murder in the Cabin
32.plot: When multi-millionaire Bob Bosley is shot to death in his luxury cabin, his wife Amy claims a robber killed Bob and dashed off into the woods. A wide search of the woods turns up nothing, but a search of Bob's lifestyle turns up many interesting details, including millions of dollars of missing money.

33.title: The Lottery Murder
33.plot: Day labourer Abraham Shakespeare wins 30 million dollars in a lottery, and that's when his troubles begin. Tired of being pestered by demanding friends and strangers asking for money, when he suddenly goes missing, the family hopes he is hiding out on a remote beach - until he turns up buried in a back yard.

34.title: Bedtime Murder
34.plot: Libbi Baume is found violently stabbed to death in her own bedroom, shocking the peaceful farming town of Payette. Libbi was a kind-hearted pre-school teacher, well-liked in the community - so people find it shocking to think she would know anyone who would want to kill her.

35.title: A Crazed Killer
35.plot: When Mark Winger shoots and kills an intruder who was violently attacking his wife, he is hailed by the public as a tragic hero. The case is quickly closed as a justifiable homicide, but for police, there's one piece of evidence that isn't adding up.

36.title: Terrified to Death
36.plot: Robert Spangler has very bad luck with his wives, they all seem to wind up dead. When police see a pattern emerging, they take a closer look at who could be making it so dangerous to be married to Robert.

38.title: A Vicious Vixen
38.plot: Soon-to-be mother Cindy Thompson is brutally murdered in a horrifying night-time attack. While Cindy and her boyfriend Mark are excited for the arrival of this new baby, police eventually discover that not everyone felt the same way.

39.title: Blood on the Ranch
39.plot: When 55 year old jogger Bob Dorotick is found dead by the side of a countryside road with tire tracks leading from the scene, it is obvious he was murdered. But what is mysterious is that he wasn't hit by a car, he was bludgeoned, drugged and strangled, and then left by the side of the road. Somebody clearly wanted Bob dead, but who?

40.title: Intent to Kill
40.plot: Fifty-six year old Jack Jessee is fighting a losing battle with cancer, but his remaining time is cut short when he is stabbed to death in his own home. Police quickly decide this is no random robbery, but all the best suspects have iron-clad alibis.

41.title: Journal of Death
41.plot: Recently separated single mother Dana Laskowski is found strangled to death in her home on a night when her triplets are visiting their father. The crime scene suggests she knew her attacker, and the investigation reveals there are more than a few people who had an unhealthy obsession with Dana.

42.title: Family Night Nightmare
42.plot: Melissa Oxley is woken in the middle of the night to a shotgun blast and the smell of gunpowder, with her husband Ben dead beside her. The killer has vanished, but the bigger mystery is why was she left alive?

43.title: Love Triangle of Evil
43.plot: Shortly after 19-year old Devon Guzman moves in with her partner Keary, she is found dead in the backseat of her car. Was it a suicide? A drug overdose? Something doesn't add up to accident, especially when police find out her relationship is an "open" one with more than one jealous lover.

44.title: Lethal Secrets
44.plot: High school student Shauna Marie Card is found viciously stabbed to death in a violent, angry attack in her own home. The only clue is secret diary that leads investigators on a roundabout path to a killer hiding very close by.

45.title: Murdered for Money
45.plot: When a dismembered body is found on the edge of Phoenix, it turns out to be travelling jewellery salesman Jay Orbin. While he adored his exotic dancer wife Marjorie, turns out she had a few lovers on the side, giving police several suspects who might have wanted him out of the way.

46.title: Late Night Killer
46.plot: Norma Rodriguez is found dead, her head wrapped in duct tape in a baffling and brutal crime. Clues point to everything from a serial killer to a random burgler, but who has a personal enough stake in her death to be so cruel?

47.title: She Almost Got Away With It
47.plot: When exotic dancer Anson "Buzz" Clinton is found shot to death by the side of the highway, it looks like a drug deal gone bad. But the investigation leads police officers into a tangled murdered plot involving crooked lawyers and a family bent on revenge.

48.title: The Barefoot Killer
48.plot: When Carolyn Krizan-Wilson claims a barefooted burglar assaulted her and shot her husband Roy McCaleb to death, police spend years trying to track down the mysterious killer. It is only with the onset of dementia does Carolyn finally reveal the missing clues to solve Roy's murder.

49.title: Limon and Hearn
49.plot: When thirty-eight year-old Robert Limon is shot while working in a remote train yard, video surveillance reveals both a limping man and a motorcycle heading to the crime scene. In an investigation full of secret passions and lies, police must figure out which one was the real killer.

50.title: Buried in the Hills
50.plot: When the severed head of Hervey Medellin is discovered by a sniffing dog in the famous Hollywood Hills, the violence of the dismemberment brings tabloid claims of serial killers and drug cartels - but who really wanted Hervey dead?

51.title: The Potters
51.plot: Happy couple Billy and Billie Jean are found shot and stabbed in their home, with a baby still cradled in Billie Jean's arms. The investigation reveals the reason might be found in a bizarrely bitter online feud.

52.title: Deadly Homecoming
52.plot: Navy Officer Cory Voss returns home from six months at sea and is shot to death at a drive-thru ATM. While at first it looks like a typical robbery, police discover not everyone was willing to welcome Cory home.

imdb.plot outline: In Plain Sight stars Mary McCormack (Private Parts and The West Wing) as Mary Shannon. Her friends and family think she's just a glorified courier, but she's actually a U.S. Marshal, working for the highly secretive Witness Protection Program. Her job is to help relocate federal witnesses. Whether they're career criminals, or just people who had the misfortune to witness a crime, they all share one thing in common - somebody wants them dead. Co-starring Frederick Weller and Lesley Ann Warren.
imdb.title: In Plain Sight
plot: _In Plain Sight_ (qv) stars Mary McCormack (Private Parts and The West Wing) as Mary Shannon. Her friends and family think she's just a glorified courier, but she's actually a U.S. Marshal, working for the highly secretive Witness Protection Program. Her job is to help relocate federal witnesses. Whether they're career criminals, or just people who had the misfortune to witness a crime, they all share one thing in common - somebody wants them dead. Co-starring Frederick Weller and Lesley Ann Warren.
